title: The most interesting champion in the world
body: Look everyone, it's Skarner! There he goes, pressing Q. Oh, and there he is again, he's gonna do it, he's gonna press Q! And I can't believe this, he just pressed Q again! And again! What a guy, you never know what he's up to. He could press Q, or maybe not, who knows? Oh, against all odds, it turned out he pressed Q! Ok, now I know for a fact he's not gonna press Q one more time. There's just no way in hell he could repeat the same button press so many times in a row. OMG, what do I know, he just pressed Q! Who could had predicted this? Lemme tell you, he's a big puzzle, that Skarner. Just when you think you've got him all pinned down and figured out he throws you a curveball. And hits Q. The absolute madman.

replies.body: Woah Shadow. How did you post? I don't see anything.
